#reading sheet
```{r}
mobility <- read.csv("mobility.csv")
regionData <- read_csv("region2024.csv") %>% 
  rename(area = LAD24CD)
```
```{r}
jointData <- mobility %>%
  left_join(regionData %>% select(area, LAD24NM), by = "area") %>%
  select(LAD24NM, area, chn2021) %>%
  mutate(chn2021 = chn2021 * 100) %>%
  write_clip()
```
